name: Comparethebazaar.com
overview:
SEARCH, COMPARE AND BUY with this motto Comparethebazaar.com has been initiated to offer the shoppers and merchants/vendors the most satisfying and confident buying and selling experience. Comparethebazaar.com is the blossoming boon for the shoppers and vendors & providing the connecting link between both with product price comparison.

Great deals from great businesses will always be interested to consumer whether they come from top notch local business or an internationally respected brands that is why we have develop various different platform on Comparethebazaar like Deal platform where we are having section of daily deal section, product deals, travel deals and lifestyle deals. We also compare prices for domestic flights, luxury hotels and bus tickets. We have develop comparethebazaar.com to have dual appeal; to the shopper through their ability to save them both time and money instead of visiting multiple websites and to product providers i.e. merchants who can improve their web presence & sales conversion by listing the products in portal.

The ranges of products that are available in Comparethebazaar are into the categories of Mobile, Cameras, Electronics, Jewelry, Gifts, Group buying deals, Travel packages and we are continuously working hard to bring new inventories and more vendors.
